import React from 'react' import defaultData from '../../data/defaultData.json' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import useIntroduce from '../../hooks/useIntroduce'; import styles from '../../assets/cssModules/introduce.module.css' const Introduce = (props) => { const { title, paragraph, imgURL } = useIntroduce(props.Page, defaultData.introduce); return (

{title}

{paragraph}

Contact Us
) } export default Introduce
